body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Govenor of Kentucky

Your Petitioner, B Rosenberg would respectfully state that his two sons, one of the age of fifteen & the other twenty, were fined in the city Court of Louisville at the November ^Term^ on an Indictment for assault & Battery, the sum of twenty five dollars each -- add the cost to this & it will amount to the sum of $40 -- each making $80 -- in the agragate. The Judgment is against Isaac Rosenberge & Simon Roseberge. The offense was drawing a pistol by the younger Rosenberge, no one was hurt, & it was not the intention of the boy to hurt any one. Your Excellency will please remit the amount in each case as the cost will amount to at least $20 --
Your Excellency is respectfully refered to the signers of this petition
Find enclosed $2 -- sec fee. The indictment against the two was joint & I suppose there will be but one fee for the remission if it is double apprise me by letter & I will send you the amount,
Direct to Baird & Price or to Phil Tompert the Clerk -- oblige

Louisville City Ct
vs
Isaac & Simon Rosenberg
$25 Each
assault
Remitted 10 Dec/65
